body:
@klenvastergan [has started](https://web.archive.org/web/20200820212126/https://ruqqus.com/@klenvastergan/comments?page=3) to [sign his posts with this image](https://ruqqus.com/post/2ff6/there-should-be-an-option-for):

![](https://i.ibb.co/xfsMVDF/klennysig.png)

[I liked the idea](https://ruqqus.com/post/2frf/where-did-all-my-libertarians-go/87qr?context=3), so I'm going to start signing my posts with an even more obnoxious (and purple, aka "porpl") image.

(Does anyone else want to do the same thing?)

![](https://i.ibb.co/SPytxLx/sfrohne.png)

Edit (2020-08-26): I've decided to make it a lot smaller

![](https://i.ibb.co/MR5FfzB/sfrohne.png)
body_html:
@klenvastergan has started to sign his posts with this image:

I liked the idea, so I'm going to start signing my posts with an even more obnoxious (and purple, aka "porpl") image.

Edit (2020-08-26): I've decided to make it a lot smaller
title: Signatures

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

body:
I've switched to using a text signature on 2020-10-23. See this: https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/49cx/signatures-v2

RIP Klenny. Here's his memorial: https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/6795/klenvastergan-permanently-suspended

<sup> - sfrohne [ If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username | [RIP Klenny](https://ruqq.us/2g1v) | Comment lndl ]</sup>
body_html:

- sfrohne [ If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username | RIP Klenny | Comment lndl ]
